nodes.text: The S3-D7 Combat Droid was a model of humanoid battle droid used by the Exchange on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Exchange used a number of X4-Z2 droids to patrol the Chemical Refinement District of the Corellian Sector.
The S3-D7 Combat Droid appears on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
